title: 13 Elevator Thoughts That'll Make You Laugh Out Loud, Because They're So Damn Relatable
text:
One place that all working professionals visit on a daily basis is the elevator; a small enclosed structure that takes us to the next level (literally), is only making our lives easier.

You realise its importance when your bay is on the 7th floor and you don't even consider taking the stairs. And God forbid, some day it breaks down.

Elevators are also the place where you might have the most random and/or intense conversations with your head. From 'what do I eat for lunch?', to 'where is my life going?', there are a lot of things that have the tendency to pop into your head while riding an elevator. Here are a few of them:

1. "Yar ye roz mere saath lift main aata hai."
